name: Machamp
author: PLANETA
flavor_text: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.

abilities.name: Fighting Fury
abilities.effect: Each of your {F} Pokémon’s attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Machamp Crush
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
